cards.title: The Ethereal Executioner
setup: At the start of the game, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} enters play “Ethereal Executioner“ side up.
gameplay: This card may regain HP above its max HP.

At the end of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s turn, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} deals the Hero with the lowest HP 1 sonic damage. Increase this damage by 1 for each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s Observation cards in play.
cards.advanced: At the end of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s turn, play the top card of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s deck.
flippedGameplay: Cards under this card have no game text and are not considered in play.

At the end of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s turn, if this card has 2 cards under it, flip this card, restore its HP to 14, shuffle all of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s cards together to form their deck, and destroy all cards under this card. Otherwise, move the top card of the Environment deck under this card.

cards.title: Premeditated Disruption
body: When this card enters play, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} deals the Hero with the lowest HP 2 infernal damage.
For each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s Observation cards in play [i](including this one)[/i], discard the top card of that Hero's deck.

cards.title: Refined Strike
body: When this card enters play, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.
Increase this damage by 1 for each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s Observation cards in play [i](including this one)[/i].

cards.title: Preliminary Measures
body: When this card enters play, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} gains 2 HP.
Increase this HP gain by 1 for each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s Observation cards in play [i](including this one)[/i].

cards.title: Target of Opportunity
body: When this card enters play, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} deals the non-Villain target with the lowest HP 0 irreducible projectile damage.
Increase this damage by 1 for each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s Observation cards in play [i](including this one)[/i].
If this destroys a target, play the top card of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s deck.

cards.title: Predetermined Path
cards.body: When this card enters play, play the top card of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s deck.

cards.title: Broken Trail
body: Discard the top X cards of the Environment deck, where X = 1 + the number of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s obervation cards in play.
If any Target cards are discarded this way, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} regains 4 HP.
If any non-Target cards are discarded this way, {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam} deals each other target 2 Toxic Damage.

cards.title: Exploit Weakness
body: Deal the Hero with the highest HP 3 projectile damage.
Increase this damage by 1 for each of {TheEtherealExecutionerTeam}'s observation cards in play.
That Hero destroys 1 of their Ongoing or Equipment cards.
